Recognized by Bloomberg and ranked among the fastest-growing companies worldwide, Way.com is making car ownership easier, more affordable, and more rewarding.

Experience Required: 10–15 years Work Arrangement: On-site Employment Type: Full-time

Role Overview

We are seeking a seasoned iOS Technical Lead with proven expertise in Swift to lead the full iOS application development lifecycle. You will be responsible for architecting scalable, high-performance mobile solutions, mentoring the development team, and ensuring our products deliver exceptional user experiences.

Key Responsibilities

  • iOS Development Leadership: Lead end-to-end app development with Swift, delivering scalable, efficient, and high-quality solutions.
  • Cross-Functional Collaboration: Partner with Product Managers and Designers to transform requirements into seamless, user-friendly mobile experiences.
  • Performance Optimization: Improve app responsiveness, stability, and performance across multiple iOS devices and OS versions.
  • Mentorship & Code Quality: Conduct code reviews, enforce best coding standards, and mentor junior developers to elevate overall team output.
  • Testing & Documentation: Ensure app reliability through thorough unit testing, clear documentation, and adherence to clean architecture practices.
  • Backend & API Integration: Work with backend teams to enable secure, efficient, and smooth API integrations.
  • Innovation & Improvement: Drive adoption of new tools, processes, and best practices to accelerate development and improve quality.
  • Feature Ownership: Take complete ownership of features from design to deployment, including post-release monitoring and optimization.
  • Continuous Learning: Keep pace with evolving iOS technologies to deliver modern, future-ready solutions.

Preferred Skills

  • 10+ years of mobile app development experience, including 6+ years in iOS development.
  • Deep expertise in Swift, UIKit, SwiftUI, and Apple’s Human Interface Guidelines.
  • Strong understanding of RESTful APIs, JSON parsing, and third-party library integration.
  • Skilled in architecting complex mobile apps using modular design patterns such as MVVM, MVI, or MVP.
  • Proficient in CI/CD workflows, automated testing, code review processes, and App Store deployments.
  • Demonstrated leadership in team management and mentoring iOS developers.
  • Experience with tools like Firebase, Mixpanel, or equivalent analytics/crash reporting platforms.
  • Solid understanding of web application ecosystems and cross-platform compatibility challenges.

Nice to Have:

  • Hands-on experience with Core Bluetooth, Core Location, or real-time service integrations (e.g., EV charging or roadside assistance).
  • Background in mobility, transportation, or automotive technology platforms.
  • Familiarity with Kotlin Multiplatform or other cross-platform development frameworks.

Why you will love working with us?

  • Opportunity to work for the #1 Auto Super app in the US.
  • Opportunity to make a meaningful impact across 10+ million users.
  • Dynamic, fast-paced, and innovation-driven work culture.
  • Clear pathways for career growth in a rapidly scaling technology company.
  • Competitive compensation.

Contact Email: careers@way.com Apply Now: https://waydot.greythr.com/hire/jobs/ios-technical-lead
